sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"
import { UglyContext } from "./UglyContext"

function UglyForm() {

    const uglyContext = useContext(UglyContext)


    return (
        <>
            <form onSubmit={uglyContext.handleSubmit}>
                <input
                    name="title"
                    placeholder="Title"
                    onChange={uglyContext.handleChange}
                ></input>

                <input
                    name="imgUrl"
                    placeholder="imgUrl"
                    onChange={uglyContext.handleChange}
                ></input>

                <input
                    name="description"
                    placeholder="Description"
                    onChange={uglyContext.handleChange}
                ></input>

                <button>Submit Ugly Thing</button>
            </form>
        </>
    )
}

export default UglyForm
